Pokeball.Name: Level Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon; works better on Pokémon of levels lower than the Pokémon currently in battle.
Pokeball.Description: A Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokémon that are at a lower level than your own Pokémon.

Pokeball.Name: Lure Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon; works better while fishing.
Pokeball.Description: A Poké Ball that is good for catching Pokémon that you reel in with a Rod while out fishing.

Pokeball.Name: Moon Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon; works better on Pokémon that evolve with a Moon Stone.
Pokeball.Description: A Poké Ball that will make it easier to catch Pokémon that can evolve using a Moon Stone.

Pokeball.Name: Friend Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon. Sets caught Pokémon's friendship to 200.
Pokeball.Description: A strange Poké Ball that will make the wild Pokémon caught with it more friendly toward you immediately.

Pokeball.Name: Love Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon; works better on Pokémon of the opposite gender, but same species as the player's Pokémon.
Pokeball.Description: A Poké Ball that works best when catching a Pokémon that is of the opposite gender of your Pokémon.

Pokeball.Name: Heavy Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon; works better on heavier Pokémon
Pokeball.Description: A Poké Ball that is better than usual at catching very heavy Pokémon.

Pokeball.Name: Fast Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon; works better on fast Pokémon.
Pokeball.Description: A Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch Pokémon that are usually very quick to run away.

Pokeball.Name: Repeat Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon; works better on Pokémon that are registered in the Pokédex as caught.
Pokeball.Description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on a Pokémon species that has been caught before.

Pokeball.Name: Timer Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon; works better in battles that have lasted longer.
Pokeball.Description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that becomes progressively more effective the more turns that are taken in battle.

Pokeball.Name: Nest Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon; works better on lower-level Pokémon.
Pokeball.Description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that becomes more effective the lower the level of the wild Pokémon.

Pokeball.Name: Net Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon; works better on Water- and Bug-type Pokémon (this does not stack if the Pokémon is both types).
Pokeball.Description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when attempting to catch Water- or Bug-type Pokémon.

Pokeball.Name: Dive Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon; works better on Pokémon encountered underwater.
Pokeball.Description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well when catching Pokémon that live underwater.

Pokeball.Name: Luxury Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon. Alters the amount by which a caught Pokémon's friendship rises.
Pokeball.Description: A particularly comfortable Poké Ball that makes a wild Pokémon quickly grow friendlier after being caught.

Pokeball.Name: Heal Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon. Fully restores a caught Pokémon's HP, PP, and status.
Pokeball.Description: A remedial Poké Ball that restores the HP of a Pokémon caught with it and eliminates any status conditions.

Pokeball.Name: Quick Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon; works best when used during the first turn of the battle.
Pokeball.Description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that has a more successful catch rate if used at the start of a wild encounter.

Pokeball.Name: Dusk Ball
Pokeball.Effect: Allows the player to catch wild Pokémon; works better when used in caves or at night.
Pokeball.Description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon at night or in dark places like caves.
